channel.title: Eros Online 24/7
channel.description:
[img]https://minecraftus.avantehosting.net/index.php?r=status/4340.png[/img] 2GB DEDICATED RAM 60 player slots. No-Lag 24/7
There is our server, with our IP and players that are currently online!
This server does NOT allow hacks, or spamming..
What we feature: We feature votifier, links will be provided by the server when they come up in the message!
When you vote and put your minecraft name in with votifier, and then, you get the item that is set up to be recieved when you type the capta and hit 'Vote'. Then you recieve the item as long as you're ONLINE in-game! :)
We feature many plugins, such as, MCMMO, Factions, and all sorts of other plugins! I will post the list of plugins when I am online and finish uploading all the plugins to the server!

item.title: Eros Online 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:


2GB DEDICATED RAM
60 player slots.
No-Lag
24/7

There is our server, with our IP and players that are currently online!

This server does NOT allow hacks, or spamming…

What we feature:
We feature votifier, links will be provided by the server when they come up in the message!

When you vote and put your minecraft name in with votifier, and then, you get the item that is set up to be recieved when you type the capta and hit ‘Vote’. Then you recieve the item as long as you’re ONLINE in-game!

We feature many plugins, such as, MCMMO, Factions, and all sorts of other plugins! I will post the list of plugins when I am online and finish uploading all the plugins to the server!
